template.template: Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent

discovery_rule.name: XFS project discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of XFS projects using /etc/projects file

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.pused[{#XFSNAME}].last()}>{$XFS.PROJECT.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#XFSNAME}"} and (({Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.total[{#XFSNAME}].last()}-{Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.pused[{#XFSNAME}].last()})<5G or {Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.pused[{#XFSNAME}].timeleft(1h,,100)}<1d)
trigger_prototype.name: {#XFSNAME}: Disk space is critically low (used > {$XFS.PROJECT.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#XFSNAME}"}%)
trigger_prototype.description: Two conditions should match: First, space utilization should be above {$XFS.PROJECT.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"}. Second condition should be one of the following: - The project free space is less than 5G. - The project will be full in less than 24 hours.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.pused[{#XFSNAME}].last()}>{$XFS.PROJECT.PUSED.MAX.WARN:"{#XFSNAME}"} and (({Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.total[{#XFSNAME}].last()}-{Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.pused[{#XFSNAME}].last()})<10G or {Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.pused[{#XFSNAME}].timeleft(1h,,100)}<1d)
trigger_prototype.name: {#XFSNAME}: Disk space is low (used > {$XFS.PROJECT.PUSED.MAX.WARN:"{#XFSNAME}"}%)
trigger_prototype.description: Two conditions should match: First, space utilization should be above {$XFS.PROJECT.PUSED.MAX.WARN:"{#XFSNAME}"}. Second condition should be one of the following: - The project free space is less than 10G. - The project will be full in less than 24 hours.

dependency.name: {#XFSNAME}: Disk space is critically low (used > {$XFS.PROJECT.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#XFSNAME}"}%)
dependency.expression: {Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.pused[{#XFSNAME}].last()}>{$XFS.PROJECT.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#XFSNAME}"} and (({Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.total[{#XFSNAME}].last()}-{Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.pused[{#XFSNAME}].last()})<5G or {Template Module Linux XFS by Zabbix agent:xfs.quota.project.pused[{#XFSNAME}].timeleft(1h,,100)}<1d)
